message: Let's split the money equally. It's fair and simple.
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but it's still a decent offer. You can't expect to get 50/50 when I'm the one making the proposal.
I think we should aim for a more equitable distribution. This time, I'm proposing a 60/40 split in favor of you.
I'm willing to compromise a bit more. This 55/45 split is a fairer offer, considering the inflation is eating away at the value of the money.
